trans-unit.resname: E02·1 | Beacon of Immortality | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Double target player's life total. Shuffle Beacon of Immortality into its owner's library.

trans-unit.resname: E02·1 | Beacon of Immortality | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The cave floods with light. A thousand rays shine forth and meld into one.

trans-unit.resname: E02·2 | Day of Judgment | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures.

trans-unit.resname: E02·3 | Path to Exile | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

trans-unit.resname: E02·4 | Shielded by Faith | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has indestructible. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may attach Shielded by Faith to that creature.
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
"Assume everything wants to kill you. At the very least, assume everything wants what's in your pack."

trans-unit.resname: E02·6 | Vow of Duty | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or a planeswalker you control.

trans-unit.resname: E02·6 | Vow of Duty | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I prefer loyalty to be a matter of respect, not of magic. But one does what one must."\n—Kaalia of the Vast

"The treasure in my mind is greater than any worldly glory."
Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Target Merfolk creature can't be blocked this turn.
"We are not an empire, and I am not a queen. But I speak with the shout of the rivers and the whisper of the clinging mist."

trans-unit.resname: E02·11 | Threads of Disloyalty | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature with converted mana cost 2 or less You control enchanted creature.

trans-unit.resname: E02·11 | Threads of Disloyalty | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Over time, Konda grew ever more suspicious, fearing even his most loyal allies were being manipulated by unseen hands."\n—*The History of Kamigawa*

Just when you thought you'd survived the first wave.
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Not to be. That is the answer.

trans-unit.resname: E02·14 | Vow of Flight | Card Text

trans-unit.resname: E02·14 | Vow of Flight | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Soaring is wasted on the winged."\n—Edric, Spymaster of Trest

trans-unit.resname: E02·16 | Child of Night | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

trans-unit.resname: E02·17 | Coat with Venom | Card Text

trans-unit.source: "Every Silumgar blade carries the blessing of our dragonlord."\n—Xathi the Infallible

As an additional cost to cast Disaster Radius, reveal a creature card from your hand. Disaster Radius deals X damage to each creature your opponents control, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.

trans-unit.resname: E02·28 | Rush of Adrenaline | Card Text

trans-unit.resname: E02·36 | Soul of the Harvest | Card Text

trans-unit.resname: E02·36 | Soul of the Harvest | Flavor Text
